name: unmount
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to make a disk or disk drive no longer available for use on a computer: In order to unmount a CD-ROM, you should use the unmount command. If you cannot safely unmount your hard drive, power down the computer by holding down the power button for six seconds.
More examplesFewer examplesNow right-click the drive icon and select "Unmount".When you have unmounted a RAM disk, the content is deleted and the memory is released.The operating system powers off USB devices after unmounting them.
